banner.description: I am currently in the third year of my Computer Science degree, and I love to continuously learn new technologies and collaborate on projects that allow me to grow professionally.

projects.description: Here are some of the projects I've worked on, collaborating with startups and university groups
projects.water-quality-description: Water quality data is displayed using charts with chart.js, the project is built with React, and the backend connects via websockets.
projects.consulta-ya: Consulta Ya is a startup that helps doctors find office rentals. It was developed using HTML, CSS, and Bootstrap.
projects.cepre-smart: Cepre Smart is a pre-university education startup. It was developed using HTML, CSS, and Bootstrap.
projects.skin-glow: Layout of the Aruma brand's website, where you can view their information, products, and contact zone. It was developed using HTML and CSS.

experience.description: I have had the opportunity to work with various technologies. Here are the most representative ones.
